message.body: We're about to get dinner. And my phones gonna die.
Ok. I thought it would have died already.
Are you going home first?
Man. I guess I saw your text too late. Well hello, now that you're home.
I shut my phone off. I'm heading back now.
Ah! Yay. Very nice.
I'm Skyping with SkyRoc, probably around 6-6:30, so I'll probably go to my parents' to shower and just Skype there.
Also, tomorrow after work I'm going to hang out with Kiara a bit because she's going back home tomorrow night for the rest of the summer.
Friday after work we might have a farewell party for Dante.
Jeez. See you Saturday.
Not good. And my unit manager just quit. I hate my job.
You act like I won't see you afterwards
So what's this mean for you?
More work, but they're not gonna replace her?
I know. Ugh. But can't you come to Skype at my house so you can have dinner first? Please?
I don't know what's happening. No one knows about it yet. My old unit manager told me this morning.
I was gonna shower first.
Fine. But there's a good chance I'll be sleeping when you get in. I hope I get a second wind when I get home.
Okay
You're just saying okay to my saying that I'll be asleep. You're not saying okay to you coming to my house first. Right?
Haha. I must be annoying.
Right
Haha it's not annoying
Man. Well that's annoying. I was hoping for a different answer.
Now I have to go back into the dungeon and hope this documentation doesn't knock me out.
Sorry. I also don't like Skyping in front of you because you lie there annoyed-looking
Okay.
Hey! I just lay in bed. I don't look annoyed. And I ask you if you want me to leave the room. I'll go away.
What's the "okay" for?
Oh never mind. I literally have not been able to think straight all day.

You shouldn't have to leave your room. I should leave your room. And yes you do lie there and look annoyed. Then you make a comment about how I don't talk and then you rush me to take a shower like I don't know how to work my own schedule.
Well I don't feel like fighting about this. See you tonight.
We're not fighting. And okay, I'll see you later
Probably around 8-8:30
Movies from Stacy?
Yeah I forgot to tell you last night
